row1.title: Consultancies
row1.content: delivering software products and services, that need to rapidly scaffold ‘fit for purpose’ underlying public-cloud platforms.

row1.title: State Governments
row1.content: operating server rooms, that want to move to the cloud but don’t have extensive infrastructure as code knowledge

row1.title: Entrepreneurs
row1.content: who want to quickly ‘spin up and spin down’ public-cloud product and service environments for MVPs and product launches.

row2.title: Enterprises
row2.content: in need of turnkey innovation labs or new product development platforms.

row2.title: Software Trainings
row2.content: that need a turnkey public-cloud platform to support their offerings.
